definition: a cornered dog will jump over the wall (idiom)/to be driven to desperate action
dog/CL:隻|只[zhi1],條|条[tiao2]
urgent/pressing/rapid/hurried/worried/to make (sb) anxious
to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate

sentences.english: When cornered, a horse will fight, and its feet and hooves can be deadly.
sentences.chinese: 當狗急跳牆，馬會出局，它的腳蹄可以致命。
